Skills: As the group expands, we are keen to meet suitably qualified and experienced Secondary practitioners for whom teaching is a vocation. Candidates must possess a Bachelor’s degree (face-to-face study) in their subject specialism, and a recognized teaching qualification. Doha Academy predominantly recruits teachers from the UK and Ireland, although teachers with a teaching qualification from other parts of the world will also be considered.
Married teaching couples are very welcome to apply. We do recruit NQTs (ECTs), although we do not currently provide the ECT support program.

Preferred.Nationality: Australia; Canada; Ireland; New Zealand; South Africa; United Kingdom
